page.title: 10 AGRICULTURE OF THE LAND
page.content: Most farming is found in the south west of the area, between Exning and Burwell. This is because the land near Newmarket and Exning is used as studs. We visited two farms, Springhead Farm and Gravelpit Farm.The larger of the two farms,Gravelpit Farm produced the most crops and is situated in vast amounts of cultivated and woodland areas.Springhead Farm is also situated in cultivated areas.Both farms produce the same sort of crops like,winter wheat,winter barley,spring barley, winter beans and sugarbeet.The two farms produce about the same amount of crops an acre,but as Gravelpit is a lot bigger they make a lot more money. Springhead Farm has around 60 acres of land which is cultivated,while Gravelpit has over 150 acres of cultivated and woodland ground.
